content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.jsearch: Fast and Simple searches for jobs posted on LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor, ZipRecruiter, Dice and others, all in a single API.

I am a university fresh graduate and looking for jobs in New York. Can you help me to look for the job salary in new york?
Begin!

I'll help you find job salary information for a fresh graduate in New York. Since you're a recent graduate, I'll search for entry-level positions to get salary estimates.

Thought: I'll use the estimated salary tool to check salaries for a typical entry-level position that's suitable for recent graduates. I'll choose a general business or technical role that's often good for new graduates.

function.arguments: {"job_title": "Entry Level Business Analyst", "location": "New York, NY, USA", "radius": 50}
function.name: estimated_salary_for_jsearch

name: estimated_salary_for_jsearch
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'OK', 'request_id': 'e2d78315-3200-440a-ba2d-38da40bedd4e', 'parameters': {'job_title': 'entry level business analyst', 'location': 'new york, ny, usa', 'location_type': 'ANY', 'years_of_experience': None}, 'data': [{'location': 'New York State', 'job_title': 'Business Analyst Entry Level', 'min_salary': 96563.16, 'max_salary': 162654.19, 'median_salary': 124471.01, 'salary_period': 'YEAR', 'salary_currency': 'USD', 'publisher_name': 'Glassdoor', 'publisher_link': 'https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/company-salaries.htm?suggestCount=0&suggestChosen=false&sc.keyword=Business%20Analyst%20Entry%20Level&locT=S&locId=428', 'confidence': 'CONFIDENT'}]}"}
Let me try another common entry-level role to give you a broader perspective:

function.arguments: {"job_title": "Entry Level Software Developer", "location": "New York, NY, USA", "radius": 50}
function.name: estimated_salary_for_jsearch

name: estimated_salary_for_jsearch
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'OK', 'request_id': '584fb70e-3191-427f-90da-1669508d2168', 'parameters': {'job_title': 'entry level software developer', 'location': 'new york, ny, usa', 'location_type': 'ANY', 'years_of_experience': None}, 'data': [{'location': 'New York State', 'job_title': 'Entry Level Software Developer', 'min_salary': 89355.04, 'max_salary': 127543.97, 'median_salary': 106347.05, 'salary_period': 'YEAR', 'salary_currency': 'USD', 'publisher_name': 'Glassdoor', 'publisher_link': 'https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/company-salaries.htm?suggestCount=0&suggestChosen=false&sc.keyword=Entry%20Level%20Software%20Developer&locT=S&locId=428', 'confidence': 'CONFIDENT'}]}"}
Now, I'll compile the information and provide a comprehensive answer:

function.arguments:
{"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "Based on recent salary data for entry-level positions in New York:

1. Entry Level Business Analyst:
   - Minimum Salary: $96,563
   - Maximum Salary: $162,654
   - Median Salary: $124,471

2. Entry Level Software Developer:
   - Minimum Salary: $89,355
   - Maximum Salary: $127,544
   - Median Salary: $106,347

Key Insights for Fresh Graduates:
- Salaries in New York are competitive for entry-level positions
- There's potential to earn between $89,000 to $162,000 depending on the role and company
- Business-related roles tend to have slightly higher starting salaries
- These figures are from Glassdoor and represent typical entry-level compensation in New York

Recommendations:
- Network actively
- Build a strong portfolio
- Consider internships or entry-level positions to gain experience
- Be open to different roles in your field of study"}
function.name: Finish
